type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Epoli](https://epoli-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Multiply Bow Speed

---

_Power Type_

Multiplies the speed of the arrow shot out of a bow from this player. (Faster arrows do more damage)

Type ID: `epoli:multiply_bow_speed`

---

### Examples

```json
{
	"type": "epoli:multiply_bow_speed",
	"multiplier": 2
}
```
This example will make arrows shot out the bow go at 2x speed.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Multiply Bow Speed (Power Type) date: 22-05-2022

Multiply Bow Speed

Power Type

Multiplies the speed of the arrow shot out of a bow from this player. (Faster arrows do more damage)

Type ID: epoli:multiply_bow_speed

Fields

Field Type Default Description
multiplier Int 1 The multiplier of arrow speed of bow.

Examples

{
	"type": "epoli:multiply_bow_speed",
	"multiplier": 2
}

This example will make arrows shot out the bow go at 2x speed.
